# Archiyou Component Editor

The Archiyou Editor is where most of the magic happens. It consists of the following parts:

  • üìã Script Editor: This is the main editor where you code and make objects (and might re-use as blocks), save scripts and directly export models.
  • üéõÔ∏è Script menu: Like a familiar menu where you can open, rename and publish scripts
  • ‚ñ∂Ô∏è The execute button: Click to run the script
  • üå∑ Viewer: After your script is executed the resulting Model is shown in the Viewer. You can navigate with the mouse and change the model quality.
  • üéöÔ∏è Parameters menu: Here you can create various parameters and reference them in your script
  • üí¨ Console: All the output of execution for debug and checking
  • ‚åõ Version History: This will allow you to go back in time to earlier version of your script
  • üå± Scene Navigator: This shows the structure of your model with Objects and Shapes
  • üìä Calc: This shows the data behind the model and allows you to create dashboards
